title: Transportation: General (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the General subcategory within Transportation. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Which is faster, a bus or a train?
cards.romaji: Basu to densha, dochira no h. ga hayai desu ka.
cards.japanese: バスと電車、どちらの方が速いですか。
